_items.body: She is a working professional undefined by age.
She is aware of the latest trends through all forms of media, particularly social.
She has a busy lifestyle juggling family, friends, pets, work and social commitments.
She is mindful of price point, but expects the best quality in fit, make and fabrication.
She is enticed by the latest trends and transeasonal wardrobe staples.

body: Accessible and approachable. Designed for a casual Australian lifestyle from workplace to weekend entertaining.

body: Effortless, modern, fun and feminine.
title: Text Title

body:
1. Piper is not about repeat styles or slight tweaks to last year’s looks.

2. Piper is not smart or stitched up.

3. Piper is not boring.
title: Text Title

_items.body:
• A very strong yarn made from the flax plant

• Very absorbent and cool

• Linen blends, such as cotton elastane and linen viscose, combine the benefits of two fabrics.
_items.title: LINEN BLENDS
COTTON
_items.body:
• Woven or knitted from the seeds of the cotton plant

• Breathable, natural fibre

• Durable and hypoallergenic

• A man-made fibre blended with other fabrics due to its exceptional elasticity

• Great shape retention, durability, wrinkle resistant
_items.title: ELASTANE

_items.body:
• A semi man-made fibre made from wood pulp, knitted or woven

• Used in a wide variety of styles

• Silky appearance and feel

• Breathable similar to cotton
_items.title: VISCOSE/SPANDEX

_items.body:
• Polyester has a similar hand-feel to silk

• Very versatile, strong, light weight and is becoming more breathable 

• Resistant to shrinking, stretching and creasing
_items.title: POLYESTER
LYOCELL/TENCEL
_items.body:
• A natural, man-made fibre made from wood pulp

• Moisture absorbent with 50% greater moisture absorption than cotton

• Breathable

• Lightweight

• Drapes beautifully

• Resistant to wrinkles.

• Resists wrinkles and returns to original shape

• Durable and resistant to tearing

• Repels moisture, keeps you warm and is breathable

• Takes dye beautifully to give good colour
_items.title: WOOL BLENDS

body:
Cool | Carefree | Fun


Piper takes a modern approach to being effortlessly trend driven regardless of body size. She is aware of the latest trends through all forms of media, particularly social. 


Mindful of price point, but expects the best quality in fit, make and fabrication.

A selection of fun price pointed sandals in summer colours are the perfect add on so make sure the baskets are kept full and looking enticing.

title: GMCQ Title

body:
Lisa is a style blogger and digital influencer, documenting all things travel, lifestyle and fashion. She is a great inspiration to look at on her blog posts and Instagram story on ways you can style your Piper outfits together.


Lisa’s style is offered in Piper collections:


•Feminine ruffles on tops and dresses

•Soft florals and stripes, mixed with denim for a weekend street style look

•Tropical prints –all product types.


Check out these links for inspiration.
